verses.verse: And the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068> was in the country <WH7704> of the Philistines <WH6430> seven <WH7651> months <WH2320>.

And the Philistines <WH6430> called <WH7121> <WH8799> for the Kohanim <WH3548> and the diviners <WH7080> <WH8802>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What shall we do <WH6213> <WH8799> to the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>? tell <WH3045> <WH8685> us wherewith we shall send <WH7971> <WH8762> it to his place <WH4725>.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, If ye send away <WH7971> <WH8764> the ark <WH727> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, send <WH7971> <WH8762> it not empty <WH7387>; but in any wise <WH7725> <WH8687> return <WH7725> <WH8686> him a trespass offering <WH817>: then ye shall be healed <WH7495> <WH8735>, and it shall be known <WH3045> <WH8738> to you why his hand <WH3027> is not removed <WH5493> <WH8799> from you.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> they, What shall be the trespass offering <WH817> which we shall return <WH7725> <WH8686> to him? They answered <WH559> <WH8799>, Five <WH2568> golden <WH2091> emerods <WH2914> <WH8675> <WH6076>, and five <WH2568> golden <WH2091> mice <WH5909>, according to the number <WH4557> of the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430>: for one <WH259> plague <WH4046> was on you all, and on your lords <WH5633>.

Wherefore ye shall make <WH6213> <WH8804> images <WH6754> of your emerods <WH2914> <WH8675> <WH6076>, and images <WH6754> of your mice <WH5909> that mar <WH7843> <WH8688> the land <WH776>; and ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8804> glory <WH3519> unto the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: peradventure he will lighten <WH7043> <WH8686> his hand <WH3027> from off you, and from off your 'elohim <WH430>, and from off your land <WH776>.

Wherefore then do ye harden <WH3513> <WH8762> your hearts <WH3824>, as the Egyptians <WH4714> and Pharaoh <WH6547> hardened <WH3513> <WH8765> their hearts <WH3820>? when he had wrought wonderfully <WH5953> <WH8694> among them, did they not let the people go <WH7971> <WH8762>, and they departed <WH3212> <WH8799> ?

Now therefore make <WH6213> <WH8798> a <WH259> new <WH2319> cart <WH5699>, and take <WH3947> <WH8798> two <WH8147> milch <WH5763> <WH8802> kine <WH6510>, on which there hath come <WH5927> <WH8804> no yoke <WH5923>, and tie <WH631> <WH8804> the kine <WH6510> to the cart <WH5699>, and bring <WH7725> <WH8689> their calves <WH1121> home <WH1004> from them <WH310>:

And take <WH3947> <WH8804> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>, and lay <WH5414> <WH8804> it upon the cart <WH5699>; and put <WH7760> <WH8799> the jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>, which ye return <WH7725> <WH8689> him for a trespass offering <WH817>, in a coffer <WH712> by the side <WH6654> thereof; and send it away <WH7971> <WH8765>, that it may go <WH1980> <WH8804>.

And see <WH7200> <WH8804>, if it goeth up <WH5927> <WH8799> by the way <WH1870> of his own coast <WH1366> to Bethshemesh <WH1053>, then he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> us this great <WH1419> evil <WH7451>: but if not, then we shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that it is not his hand <WH3027> that smote <WH5060> <WH8804> us: it was a chance <WH4745> that happened to us <WH1961> <WH8804>.

And the men <WH582> did so <WH6213> <WH8799>; and took <WH3947> <WH8799> two <WH8147> milch <WH5763> <WH8802> kine <WH6510>, and tied <WH631> <WH8799> them to the cart <WH5699>, and shut up <WH3607> <WH8804> their calves <WH1121> at home <WH1004>:

And they laid <WH7760> <WH8799> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068> upon the cart <WH5699>, and the coffer <WH712> with the mice <WH5909> of gold <WH2091> and the images <WH6754> of their emerods <WH2914>.

And the kine <WH6510> took the straight <WH3474> <WH8799> way <WH1870> to the way <WH1870> of Bethshemesh <WH1053>, and went along <WH1980> <WH8804> the highway <WH4546> <WH259>, lowing <WH1600> <WH8800> as they went <WH1980> <WH8800>, and turned not aside <WH5493> <WH8804> to the right hand <WH3225> or to the left <WH8040>; and the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> went <WH1980> <WH8802> after <WH310> them unto the border <WH1366> of Bethshemesh <WH1053>.

And they of Bethshemesh <WH1053> were reaping <WH7114> <WH8802> their wheat <WH2406> harvest <WH7105> in the valley <WH6010>: and they lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> their eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the ark <WH727>, and rejoiced <WH8055> <WH8799> to see <WH7200> <WH8800> it.

And the cart <WH5699> came <WH935> <WH8802> into the field <WH7704> of Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, a Bethshemite <WH1030>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> there, where there was a great <WH1419> stone <WH68>: and they clave <WH1234> <WH8762> the wood <WH6086> of the cart <WH5699>, and offered <WH5927> <WH8689> the kine <WH6510> a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And the L'vi'im <WH3881> took down <WH3381> <WH8689> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>, and the coffer <WH712> that was with it, wherein the jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091> were, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> them on the great <WH1419> stone <WH68>: and the men <WH582> of Bethshemesh <WH1053> offered <WH5927> <WH8689> burnt offerings <WH5930> and sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8799> sacrifices <WH2077> the same day <WH3117> unto the YY <WH3068>.
And when the five <WH2568> lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> had seen <WH7200> <WH8804> it, they returned <WH7725> <WH8799> to Ekron <WH6138> the same day <WH3117>.

And these are the golden <WH2091> emerods <WH2914> which the Philistines <WH6430> returned <WH7725> <WH8689> for a trespass offering <WH817> unto the YY <WH3068>; for Ashdod <WH795> one <WH259>, for Gaza <WH5804> one <WH259>, for Askelon <WH831> one <WH259>, for Gat <WH1661> one <WH259>, for Ekron <WH6138> one <WH259>;

And the golden <WH2091> mice <WH5909>, according to the number <WH4557> of all the cities <WH5892> of the Philistines <WH6430> belonging to the five <WH2568> lords <WH5633>, both of fenced <WH4013> cities <WH5892>, and of country <WH6521> villages <WH3724>, even unto the great <WH1419> stone of Hevel <WH59>, whereon they set down <WH3240> <WH8689> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>: which stone remaineth unto this day <WH3117> in the field <WH7704> of Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, the Bethshemite <WH1030>.

And he smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the men <WH376> of Bethshemesh <WH1053>, because they had looked <WH7200> <WH8804> into the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>, even he smote <WH5221> <WH8686> of the people <WH5971> fifty <WH2572> thousand <WH505> and threescore and ten <WH7657> men <WH582>: and the people <WH5971> lamented <WH56> <WH8691>, because the YY <WH3068> had smitten <WH5221> <WH8689> many of the people <WH5971> with a great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347>.

And the men <WH582> of Bethshemesh <WH1053> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Who is able <WH3201> <WH8799> to stand <WH5975> <WH8800> before <WH6440> this holy <WH6918> YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430>? and to whom shall he go up <WH5927> <WH8799> from us?

And they sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> to the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Kiryat-Ye`arim <WH7157>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The Philistines <WH6430> have brought again <WH7725> <WH8689> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>; come ye down <WH3381> <WH8798>, and fetch it up <WH5927> <WH8685> to you.
